entries.title: Boromir
text: The world of men will fall, and all will come to darknessâ€¦ and my city to ruin.

entries.title: Aragorn
text: I do not know what strength is in my blood, but I swear to you I will not let the white city fall, nor our people fail!

entries.title: Boromir
text: I would have followed you my brother...
